calculations-learn-more: A difference in sign between the amount and percentage is due to when the funds and profits were realized. Learn more in <0>this article.</0>

not-enough-data: Not enough historic data for this period

edit.title: Edit Service Profile
edit.name: Service Name:
edit.success-fee-desc: Amount of profits you will charge your investors (including {{ zignalyFee }}% ZIGDAO fee)

visibility.private-desc: Service available to logged users with the URL
visibility.public-desc: Service available to any visitor with the URL
visibility.marketplace-desc: Service published in the marketplace to everyone
visibility.marketplace-requirements: To be listed in the marketplace, check out the <0>list of requirements</0> and contact our support through the widget once your service meets the requirements

validation.success-fee-range: Must be 0 or an integer between 10 and 75

commission.title: Participate in {{ whitelabel }} referral promotion:
commission.description: {{ whitelabel }} is offering referrers up to 100% of it's own success fees. To bring more investors to your service, you can match {{ whitelabel }}'s offer or exceed it.
commission.max-success-fee: Max success fee paid to referrers:
commission.increase-success-fee: Increase your success fee to offer a bonus and attract more users to your service

create.title: Create new service
create.bybit-warning: Please fill the following <0>form</0> to be part of Bybit Beta.
create.minimum-balance:
To trade and allow investors to invest, you need to invest at least 
 {{ minValue }} {{ minValueCoin }} in your service
create.profits-explainer: Decide how much of your profits from trading and success fees you would like to request to transfer out automatically.
create.please-verify: *Please review your info. Type and base can't be changed later
create.zero-fee: If you choose success fee = 0, ZIGDAO will not charge any fee either
